title: Mathematics Problem-Solving Workshop Using Hybrid Practice Modes Based on Transfer Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, statistics, calculus) and data analysis experience related to work
context.additional_context: Case-based learning utilizing actual workplace data within corporate contexts

learning_goals: Learners will solve new workplace problems by integrating three or more mathematical concepts
Learners will process near transfer cases with 80% or higher accuracy in blended practice mode
Learners will process far transfer cases with 60% or higher accuracy in blended practice mode
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
